title: Court of Honor
description: Sixteen-year-old Becky Walden has two big to become an All-State basketball player and to find a special boy to love. But when small town politics threaten these dreams, Becky must stand up for what she believes is right -- no matter what the cost. [previous Winner of the Romance Writers of America Golden Heart Award for Best Young Adult Novel Published by Dragonfly Publishing, Inc. www.dragonflypubs.com Available in hardback, paperback, and eBook]
author: Paula Gorgas
